sentences.en: Any other marks desired by Licensor.
sentences.cn: 其他许可方要求的标志.

sentences.en: Attribution. You must attribute the work in the manner specified by the author or licensor.
sentences.cn: 姓名标示. 您必须按照作者或授权人所指定的方式,保留其姓名标示.

sentences.en: Do not allow anyone to revoke my enterprise server licensor certificate.
sentences.cn: 不允许任何人吊销我的企业服务器许可方证书.

sentences.en: In return, the licensee agrees to pay the licensor a flat fee or a royalty.
sentences.cn: 作为交换, 许可证接受方同意付给许可证供方一笔统一收费或特许权使用费.

sentences.en: Licensee shall promptly provide with Licensor with the proper tax certificate to obtain the tax credits.
sentences.cn: 被许可方应向许可方及时提供其税收减免证书以获得课税减免.

sentences.en: Licensor guarantees that it is the legitimate owner or holder of Know - how and license to Licensee.
sentences.cn: 许可方保证是本专有技术的合法所有者或持有者,并且有权许可被许可方使用.

sentences.en: Licensor guarantees that Licensee shall not be claimed for product liability in relation to Contract Products.
sentences.cn: 许可方保证不会发生被许可方被指控有关合同产品上的侵权责任.

sentences.en: Specify a third party public key that can revoke my enterprise Licensor Certificate.
sentences.cn: 指定可吊销我的企业许可方证书的第三方公钥.

sentences.en: Specify a third party public key that can revoke my enterprise server licensor certificate.
sentences.cn: 指定可吊销我的企业服务器许可方证书的第三方公钥.

sentences.en: Specify your enterprise server licensor certificate revocation policy.
sentences.cn: 指定您的企业服务器许可方证书吊销策略.

sentences.en: The licensor simply agrees to provide technology.
When interrogative pronoun and appear simultaneously, the former is restrained by syntactic licensor including negative operator.
sentences.cn: 疑问代词和否定词共现时, 前者要受到包括否定算子在内的句法允准语的约束.

sentences.en: You must attribute the work in the manner specified by the author or licensor.
sentences.cn: 必须按照作者或授权人所指定的方式,表彰其姓名.

trans.tran_cn: 认可证颁发者（尤指批准书籍出版或戏剧演出的官员）
